column1: Wishing you and your families a happy Thanksgiving! Even if your celebrations look different this year I hope it's a special and restful holiday. Despite the hardships of this year there is still much to be thankful for and I encourage us to take time to reflect on that. https://t.co/4NH0VpGO4D
Live now on @1055WERC with JT! Hope you’re tuning in #AL06!
Live now on the @JeffPoorShow! Tune in #AL06!

My website has a page dedicated to regular updates on new facts and advisories about #COVID19. Check it out today for the latest information on #OperationWarpSpeed vaccine candidates and the encouraging news on those fronts.  https://t.co/UZHEppAvYl
Live now with @mattmurphyshow on @realtalk995! Hope you're tuning in #AL06!

Republicans want to work to help the American people. Pelosi has repeatedly blocked common sense legislation and instead tried to placate the most radical left. This has cost the Democrats many House seats. The choice ahead is simple—political games or common ground. #LetsWork https://t.co/1OqBadjsmV

I'm honored that my colleagues have elected me to serve them on the @GOPpolicy Committee again for the 117th Congress. I look forward to the great work we'll do together over the next two years!  https://t.co/4t8FkYqhR2

More good news on #COVID19 vaccines! @moderna_tx says its candidate is showing >90% effectiveness. We're indebted to medical innovators & the Trump Admin's efforts through #OperationWarpSpeed for their tireless work to deliver a vaccine in record time. https://t.co/k1flxqG7xV

House Democrats are again trying to consolidate power and shield themselves from opposing ideas. Their vote-by-proxy scheme is already unconstitutional and rejects precedent. The new "vote by text" scheme takes it even further and will dangerously undermine our institutions. https://t.co/QdvwvWY2K2

Today we honor the brave men & women who have fought to defend our country & freedom. I want to highlight one veteran from #AL06 today. Sam Romano is from B'ham and joined the Army Corps of Engineers in the 1950s. Read more of his story here:  https://t.co/kneVGy0jFk

This is encouraging news about the development of a #COVID19 vaccine. Thanks to our medical researchers & the Trump Admin for their dedication to fighting this virus & for working together effectively to deliver a vaccine for the American people. https://t.co/plJyaARTy0

Good news continues on the jobs front! The #JobsReport has once again exceeded expectations for October proving that the American economy is resilient and more and more Americans are going back to work.  https://t.co/1htkJKSsMx
Live now with @jeff_poor talking election integrity. Tune in #AL06! https://t.co/jQdZXQArt6
Really enjoyed visiting Hope Christian School in Pelham and speaking to their Student Government Association! Special thanks to Candous Langston. https://t.co/nDAEqi5IDR

Congrats to Sridhara Gutti President & CEO of Birmingham's @Essnova Solutions on AL's Small Business Person of the Year Award from the US @SBAgov Admin! Essnova offers many data services to federal agencies & commercial clients. Read more below! #AL06  https://t.co/7QmSVZbvgE https://t.co/NRtYUE4zXU

Great to be in Tarrant for the ribbon cutting of the new city hall and to wish a fond farewell to Mayor Loxcil Tuck as she steps down after serving since 2004. Thank you Mayor Tuck! #AL06 https://t.co/eYukSwilOm

Government-run healthcare does not lead to better care. It leads to waitlists and rationing of treatments which in turn lead to sicker patients and even death before care becomes available. https://t.co/ZKmiP0FWcq

Republicans' #CommitmentToAmerica shows that we believe our country is worth fighting for. We are committed to restoring American values and way of life rebuilding the best economy in a generation and renewing the American dream. The choice is clear.  https://t.co/enBnKWaETX

Great conversation with @rickandbubba this morning about the Republican healthcare plan especially for those with pre-existing conditions! Check it out if you missed it and be sure to read the show notes for extra resources. Thanks for having me! Listen: https://t.co/eWLIqbZFNw https://t.co/fSJMcappDe
The US economy is still rebounding with a record-setting 33.1% GDP growth over the last quarter! The #GreatAmericanComeback from the losses of #COVID19 continues! https://t.co/LRwu4uxoOQ

Read this helpful breakdown of #OperationWarpSpeed by @HHSGov Secretary Azar. This initiative to develop a #COVID19 vaccine has partnered the public & private industries in uniquely American ways. Now we are closer to a vaccine than many thought possible. https://t.co/E2i10a6yb8

Congratulations to #JusticeAmyConeyBarrett! The confirmation of an eminently qualified fair and constitutionalist justice should instill confidence in every American. Justice Barrett will serve our country with distinction and integrity. https://t.co/55NmHhFBvh

President @realDonaldTrump has just announced another momentous peace deal in the Middle East. Sudan is following the UAE & Bahrain in normalizing relations w/ Israel a historic move that will hopefully have great impact on future stability in the region. https://t.co/YbI4VXI3qF

I commend Judge #AmyConeyBarrett for securing the Judiciary Committee votes for moving her nomination to the full Senate. Her brilliant legal mind & commitment to the Constitution are beyond reproach. I urge & look forward to her confirmation on Monday. #ConfirmACB #FillThatSeat https://t.co/fNCPI4UNu1

Today Senate Democrats once again blocked clean #COVID19 relief legislation proving once again that radical Democrats are more interested in playing political games than helping American workers and businesses. The American people deserve better. https://t.co/ZPqdjUUvax
Going live in a few minutes with @mattmurphyshow and @AunieLindenberg on @realtalk995! Make sure you’re tuning in #AL06!

Thank you @NFIB for naming me one of the 116th's Congress's Guardians of Small Business! We are seeing now more than ever how vital small businesses are to the American economy. #smallbizguardian https://t.co/y21HzEk13u

Students have until 7pm CT / 8pm ET tonight to submit an app for the #CongressionalAppChallenge! I hope #AL06 students will take advantage of this great opportunity to grow their STEM skills. Submit at https://t.co/JjUPvg5uxz. #Congress4CS https://t.co/VfLFnKhAhf
Last chance to submit an app for the #CongressionalAppChallenge! Deadline is this Monday October 19. Read the full guidelines and submit your app at https://t.co/JjUPvfNT8Z. https://t.co/w7jY0RraMW

Check out this helpful update from @CDCgov on #COVID19 vaccine development under #OperationWarpSpeed the initiative to expedite the process. The Trump Administration's dedication to working towards a safe vaccine on such a fast timeline is commendable.  https://t.co/rD2zgRtTaT

#JudgeAmyConeyBarrett has only further proven how qualified she is for #SCOTUS during this week of hearings. She's been thorough respectful and steady and her brilliant legal mind has been on full display. The Senate should confirm her without delay. #ConfirmACB https://t.co/LO9DyDV10y

One week left to submit an app for the #CongressionalAppChallenge! This is an ideal contest for students interested in coding to hone their skills. Read rules and submit an app at https://t.co/JjUPvg5uxz. Call my office at 205.968.1290 with any questions. #Congress4CS https://t.co/99KM5okIKw
I'm looking forward to joining @rickandbubba @ 9amCST. Tune in! https://t.co/9AdEFWJbGe
I'll be talking with @JTNyse on @1055WERC momentarily and @mattmurphyshow later this morning. Tune in!
Millions of mail-in ballots will be used this year and it's vital that we maintain the integrity of the election. There should be a legible postmark on every single ballot. https://t.co/5HF8zRWoAz

Time is running out to submit apps for the #CongressionalAppChallenge! Deadline is Oct 19. Learn more and submit an app at https://t.co/JjUPvfNT8Z. Call my office at 205.968.1290 with questions. I hope middle and high schoolers will consider this chance to advance coding skills. https://t.co/hPQjNm7eWC

Democrats denied 35 requests from @HouseGOP Members to vote on a bill that would direct unused #PPP $ to aid small businesses. Pelosi instead introduced a bill that: 🔴Defunds police 🔴Lets stimulus checks go to illegal immigrants 🔴Releases criminals 🔴Federalizes elections https://t.co/kNYRSCA1wL

This is good news as one more vaccine candidate means a higher chance of producing an effective one. The Trump Administration should be commended for its #OperationWarpSpeed effort to develop a safe #COVID19 vaccine on such a fast timeline. https://t.co/76ZtyGHAMo

I applaud President @realDonaldTrump for his #BornAlive executive order which protects all infants from neglect and ensures they receive proper medical care regardless of their circumstances of birth. All children deserve these basic protections.  https://t.co/4o0E6aD2HE

#JudgeAmyConeyBarrett has a stellar record of faithfully interpreting the law & upholding the Constitution. I have no doubt she will make an excellent #SCOTUS Justice and I urge the Senate to confirm her quickly. Full statement: https://t.co/ieOCoLO6gO

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram has unused funds that small businesses need but the Speaker refuses to hold a vote. I signed Rep @HerreraBeutler's discharge petition to force a vote because our workers deserve better from us. #FightForSmallBiz  https://t.co/imCopurFyq

Last night I introduced the #Coronavirus Relief Fund Flexibility Act. The goals of it are to reduce waste to give states more choice in how unspent relief money is spent and to incentivize needed infrastructure. Read my full statement here:  https://t.co/ASf0nu2G64

Middle and high schoolers don't forget to submit an app for the Congressional App Challenge by Oct 19! Open to all who meet basic requirements no coding experience necessary. Register & submit at https://t.co/smvT6xhh06. Questions? Call my office at 205.968.1290. #Congress4CS https://t.co/wx1cppp7ef

It was great to catch up with my good friends @mattmurphyshow and @AunieLindenberg on @realtalk995 this morning. We discussed the newly unexpected #SCOTUS vacancy and what it means for the 2020 election. Listen here if you missed it:  https://t.co/ZCbrCyELQE.

With the passing of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg #SCOTUS has lost an iconic member. She was an inspiration to millions of young women and to countless others with her resilience in her long fight against cancer. Ann and I are praying for her family’s comfort and peace.

PSA: Time is running out to complete your #Census! We only have until September 30th. The census response rate is especially crucial for the continued development and health of rural areas. Go to https://t.co/BtfZv1CSTw to respond!   https://t.co/X9Zo11ygeL

The economic fallout from #COVID19 has been severe and sadly many have used the crisis for their own ends. Fraudulent unemployment claims have already become a problem so today I introduced a bill to try to reduce fraud and waste. Read more here: https://t.co/oW0MReE7Ji

On this day in 1787 delegates to the Constitutional Convention signed our #Constitution. It was a new experiment but it has now successfully guided our country for 233 years. It is now more important than ever to defend and pass it on to future generations. #ConstitutionDay https://t.co/F23OtKxwYE
I'm proud to join my @HouseGOP colleagues in declaring our commitment to the American people restoring our way of life rebuilding our economy and renewing the American dream.  https://t.co/BjrC7jbMeS

History is unfolding today as @realDonaldTrump welcomes Prime Minister @netanyahu and Emirati and Bahraini officials to the @WhiteHouse for the signing of the #AbrahamAccords. I applaud the President's leadership and dedication in brokering these historic peace deals. https://t.co/rR7GumaglK

America still carries scars of the #911 attacks from 19 years ago. But I'm always encouraged when I remember how Americans came together in the aftermath. I hope that on this sobering anniversary we'll look to how we responded then as an example for the present. #NeverForget https://t.co/mthBlZftyD

Did you know that in #Alabama suicide is the 3rd leading cause of death for ages 10-34 & 4th leading cause of death for ages 35-44? If you need help or know someone who does there's 24/7 help at 1-800-273-8255. You're not alone & you can #KeepGoing.  #WorldSuicidePreventionDay https://t.co/LrZ2DSMDIW

Smart reopening of businesses and letting Americans work continue to prove the best antidotes to the economic hardship brought on by the #COVID19 crisis. Recovery is going strong and I look forward to seeing job numbers increase even more! https://t.co/ImpLRCkTmP
Many congratulations to the 13 @uabmedicine students selected by @BCBSofAlabama for the 2020 Rural Physicians Scholarship!  https://t.co/Ssd2ctFhGa

The recovery continues! For the fourth month in a row since the peak of #COVID19 the #JobsReport has exceeded expectations and the unemployment rate has dropped. There's still work to do but the American economy is coming back strong.  https://t.co/zjHDMMEKR7

I applaud President @realDonaldTrump for standing up for law and order. Our tax dollars shouldn't be funding cities whose mayors and governors don't take the protection of law-abiding citizens seriously. I hope this motivates them to step up.  https://t.co/Hhgx4RbTnr

Make Alabama count by filling out your #2020Census today #AL06! It only takes a few minutes and the response rate to the census has great impact on the future of Alabama's federal funding and number of seats in Congress. Respond now by clicking here: https://t.co/vxAyrmEU82 https://t.co/QF4IO6dtBu

Another vaccine candidate is making positive strides! #OperationWarpSpeed is accomplishing what many would have thought impossible a few months ago. I commend the Trump Administration for its work to ensure a safe & effective #COVID19 vaccine is produced in historic record time. https://t.co/UuzXLWwOCA

Today marks 100 years since the #19thAmendment was adopted into the US Constitution officially granting women the right to vote. This is a historic centennial and we honor the women who went before us to fight for the voices of future generations of women and girls. https://t.co/dnZETyllh2

I chatted with @NPRinskeep of @NPR yesterday morning in advance of the Oversight & Reform hearing about the @USPS. What I discussed then remained true during the hearing. It was about political posturing not "saving" the USPS. Listen here:  https://t.co/tmJdSY1do5

Today in a @USPS hearing I noted how selective Dems' outrage is. During the Obama Admin dozens of mail-facilities closed & there was a 48% increase in slowed mail delivery yet @OversightDems didn't bother to discuss it then. Full Q&A & statement:  https://t.co/Ozb3yqdzny
Where was the outcry about mail delays and mail facility closures during the Obama-Biden Administration? https://t.co/X55MWckqyf

Americans should take note that Speaker Pelosi can't be bothered to call Congress into session to work on helping vulnerable citizens or economic recovery but that she did call session to prolong a conspiracy to attack @POTUS. Statement on #USPSHoax vote: https://t.co/QxV2gsTwgQ

This would help make sure the mail is delivered on time and people feel safe in getting it from their mail box or post office. The Democrats' silence on this is truly deafening. https://t.co/24yzFZvxvk

I'm sure mail in Portland Seattle Chicago NYC & Minneapolis has been delayed lately. I'd submit that time would've been better spent today ensuring law enforcement in major cities is funded so they can protect USPS facilities & people who deliver mail. https://t.co/24yzFZvxvk

I was back in DC today because Dems are perpetuating a conspiracy theory about the @USPS to attack @POTUS. It's also scary how silent they are about the anarchy in major cities. https://t.co/24yzFZvxvk

The so-called @USPS “emergency” is an invented crisis that Dems are fueling to attack @POTUS. Facts:  -USPS is funded thru at least Aug 2021 -USPS CAN handle high mail volume for election  -USPS often moves lesser-used mailboxes -#CARESAct approved a $10B loan to USPS when needed

It's the 100th anniversary of the #19thAmendment 's ratification guaranteeing women's right to vote. It was passed by Congress in 1919 & last year I honored this step on the floor by sharing some family history. Watch here: https://t.co/EAhn8s7nTD

Multiple #COVID19 vaccine candidates are nearing or are already conducting final-stage trials. This is a huge step in defeating the virus and the Trump Administration should be commended for its work to develop a vaccine on a historically fast timeline. #OperationWarpSpeed https://t.co/ZZ8Pvtq8KU

This historic agreement is good news for #Israel the #UAE and the Middle East. It is a hopeful step forward in fostering peace and stability in the region for years to come. Excellent work from President @realDonaldTrump. https://t.co/Os9Qxk1w7w

With every supposed #COVID19 relief bill Democrats have proven they will let no crisis go to waste. The latest legislation is once again a wish list of far leftist agenda items that would be devastating for the American economy and way of life. https://t.co/Z9HaBiAasM

More good news! The #JobsReport has beat expectations again for July proving that America is still recovering amidst this difficult time of fighting #COVID19. American ingenuity and hard work continue to be the best antidotes to our current challenges. https://t.co/H8Dv4AexNn

Don’t forget: TOMORROW is the last day to apply for the #PaycheckProtectionProgram! Be sure to make the most of this program that has helped keep so many businesses open as we fight #COVID19. Learn more and apply: https://t.co/AN2vy10xRl https://t.co/IRGHdJsRs9
Our IT dependence on China is a national security threat. We need to find out the cost of moving our supply chain away from China @OMBPress @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/UbPGh1ubdu

Congrats to Pamela Hamilton of the 6th District for being named a recipient of the Presidential Award for Excellence in Mathematics & Science Teaching! Thank you Ms. Hamilton for your dedication & investment in the students of the 6th District! #AL06 https://t.co/W0bBrQYsOb

I am pleased to see President @realDonaldTrump taking executive action that will permanently expand access to life-saving care especially for those in rural areas. My full statement on yesterday's executive order here: https://t.co/UWBxSUu6Sv

Did you know plasma in those recovered from #COVID19 still contains antibodies that could help a sick person fight the virus? If you've recovered from #COVID19 consider donating plasma as one more way to help America defeat this pandemic. Read more: https://t.co/tu3Sn7IiQq https://t.co/o2f1uvvHgs

It is sad that @ClimateCrisis Democrats once again hid from real debate at this week’s hearing by attacking @ShellenbergerMD’s character and then refusing him the right to defend himself. Read his response that the Democrats tried to silence here: https://t.co/5eE0sdPRPU

ICYMI: My latest at @dcexaminer on how Dems' proposed stimulus is "eerily similar" to the one passed in 2009 w/ disastrous results. @realDonaldTrump's economy was booming before #COVID19. We need Americans at work to recover that not expanded welfare.   https://t.co/lLmkAhs5JL
My second Q&A in today's hearing this time with Census Bureau Director Dr. Dillingham. There are many many problems with counting illegal immigrants in the #Census2020. https://t.co/qs8g5t9OpI

My questions in today's Oversight & Reform hearing: Foreign nationals whether here legally or illegally can't run for office donate to campaigns or vote in US elections. So why would we count them in the #Census2020? https://t.co/wHdl7vyvbb

There are still 2 weeks left to apply for a #PaycheckProtectionProgram loan! The PPP has had a crucial role in keeping small businesses open and employees on payroll as we navigate the #COVID19 crisis. Applications open till August 8th! Learn more here: https://t.co/AN2vy10xRl https://t.co/zSDOtrz1Lj

Democrats' #NoBanAct is not about policy but undermining @POTUS. They planned to pass this bill in March but pulled it as #COVID19 spread & travel restrictions ensued for safety reasons. This shows the bill's recklessness. It undermines any president's ability to keep us safe.

Congrats to Kyuna Kim of Vestavia Hills for being accepted into the National Youth Orchestra of the USA/NYO2 virtual intensive program! This is a highly competitive program that recruits the best young musicians across the USA. Congrats Kyuna! #AL06  https://t.co/ggOHg2oB5O

The ACOG v. FDA decision makes dangerous abortion drugs available by mail without even obtaining a doctor's approval. AG Barr HHS @SecAzar @SteveFDA: please stand for women and babies by appealing this decision.  #ProLife

I‘m saddened by the passing of my friend & colleague John Lewis. He was a kind gentle man who often reminded me that though he represented the 5th district of GA he was born & raised near Troy AL. Ann & I will be praying for God's comfort and peace to cover his family.

Thanks for having me on to talk #FSA accounts Ric! People's 2020 #FSA funds are now at risk due to #COVID19 closures all over the country. I'm working to ensure that those dollars are protected. No one should be penalized for planning ahead. https://t.co/YQNd4jknAy

Last year I sat down w/ @ChrisEvans to discuss my views on a variety of topics for his new platform that aims to help Americans exchange ideas & engage w/ government. @ASP has officially launched! Thanks to Chris & his team for having me! My videos here: https://t.co/Jy4ycPc5ZR https://t.co/0fwLhfjBUN

I have offered an amendment for the #NDAA that would strike a current measure to remove the position of Chief Management Officer at the Pentagon. Thank you for recognizing the importance of keeping this role @NTU! https://t.co/E7rkpiPKJ1

I'm pleased to announce that 10 outstanding students from #AL06 have been appointed to U.S. Service Academies. I look forward to seeing what the future holds for them and am confident they will serve our country with honor.  https://t.co/Lxa8RZcbd4
Reminder: #TaxDay is now just two days away! You have until midnight on Wednesday July 15 to file online or have your return postmarked. https://t.co/loBUQPO9fX

I am saddened to hear of the passing of Mayor Billy Joe Driver. He lived a life of service to Clanton & Chilton Co as a firefighter a city council member & for the last 36 years as Mayor. Ann & I are praying for his family friends & Clanton citizens. https://t.co/J73wiBfetB
I'm excited to announce that our office's Deputy Chief Cari Fike will also be assuming the role of Executive Director of the Republican Policy Committee effective next week.  https://t.co/vafP0JHJht

I'm thrilled #SCOTUS ruled yesterday in a 7-2 decision in favor of the #LittleSistersofthePoor holding that the Sisters are exempt from the contraceptive mandate on religious grounds. This case is a huge win for religious liberty for all! https://t.co/r2runmDVbp

Important to know: the #PaycheckProtectionProgram has extended its application deadline to August 8th! This program has saved millions of jobs and it is still providing vital help to vulnerable businesses. Apply here: https://t.co/AN2vy10xRl https://t.co/la1gq3fdsY

Incredible news from the June jobs report: 4.8 million jobs were added in the US in June bringing the total number of new jobs between May and June to 7.5 million! The American economy is recovering! https://t.co/pMCgKlPeJ5

Happy #IndependenceDay! The challenges Americans have faced the past few months have made me more grateful than ever for the ideals of liberty and opportunity that made our nation possible and for the innovation and resilience of Americans. I wish you a blessed holiday weekend! https://t.co/wEqREnxTmP

I'm proud to cosponsor @RepDustyJohnson's Mt Rushmore Protection Act. There's a troubling campaign to erase America's history & I'm committed fighting it. We can't deny our history or discredit our country’s founders if we hope to keep improving it. https://t.co/xc7hjTxArR

The First Lady is launching an art exhibit to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the 19th Amendment's ratification! Students in grades 3-12 may submit artwork of people objects & events that represent the women’s suffrage movement. Read more & submit: https://t.co/Zi2HFJX9mV
The #USMCA trade agreement goes into effect today! It promises a strengthened economy and thousands of jobs added to the US right when we need them! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/WqSxJAPYs0

After spending millions of taxpayer dollars the Select Climate Committee is avoiding issuing a formal committee report about its findings. This should tell us something about their findings and the alleged crisis—they are not supported by sound science. https://t.co/7Q8KOUlXl4
Great news for US Space exploration: @NASA has completed the final structural test for Artemis Lunar Missions at @NASA_Marshall Space Flight Center. https://t.co/ZQdi8uOCdZ

Democrats said they wanted to work with Republicans on police reform but today they passed a bill that was introduced with no Republican input. It would also make police departments ineffective at best & outright abolish them at worst. Full statement: https://t.co/3wlRHa6hCp
I applaud President Trump for taking executive action to strengthen America's adoption and foster care system and to promote permanency for children in foster care.  https://t.co/fA4m4atIAR

Happy 104th birthday to Mr. Walter Jones of Gardendale! Mr. Jones is a World War II Marine veteran and was recognized with a drive-by Jeep parade this morning. It was an honor to be a part of celebrating him and his long full life of service to others! #AL06 https://t.co/pFm5vHaPJs

This week's markup of Dems' #MyWayortheHighway bill showed a disappointing lack of bipartisanship. The bill was created w/ no Republican input & prioritizes far-left agendas like the Green New Deal not our infrastructure. Full statement from markup:  https://t.co/jVVG3FNA4i

Democrats' #MyWayortheHighway bill has little to do with improving infrastructure & much to do with the Green New Deal & leftist agendas. Rebuilding infrastructure has an even more important role than usual as we work toward economic recovery. This is no time for partisanship. https://t.co/MJnNf0hVj2

As America reopens and work toward economic recovery the #PaycheckProtectionProgram plays a key role in helping many businesses stay afloat. Read more about the program's success in this report from the @FinancialCmte: https://t.co/EqE5XNmVrK

I've #HR7149 to allow for temporary protection of 2020 FSA funds in light of the pandemic. People shouldn't be penalized for planning ahead because of unusual circumstances. See my full statement and more details about the bill here: https://t.co/8g33fB569Y
Live now with @jeff_poor! Hope you're tuning in #AL06! https://t.co/3Uy7vNqe2c

Last night I joined @WVTM13 to discuss #GeorgeFloyd and the conversations around police reform. Defunding the police would be reckless and dangerous. What we need is reform and more accountability and transparency. Watch:  https://t.co/BEv3v56fMB

Thanks to strong leadership & smart reopening efforts the economy is on the road to recovery from #COVID19. The May Jobs Report surpassed expectations and proves that Americans at work are the best thing for the economy. Let's keep up the effort by continuing to #ReopenAmerica https://t.co/7hbaQkLKk0

“The hopes and prayers of liberty-loving people everywhere march with you.” —Gen. Dwight Eisenhower to his troops before the Allies stormed the Normandy beaches  On this 76th anniversary of #DDay we honor those who fought and died that day to preserve the liberty we have today. https://t.co/IVyiHrIjJY

I'm pleased POTUS has issued an EO that directs federal agencies to expedite the review of infrastructure projects that are critical to jumpstarting our economy in the wake of the #COVID19 pandemic. https://t.co/aha9QA0cb5

The 2020 #CongressionalAppChallenge has launched! Open to all students who meet basic requirements no coding experience necessary! Learn more register & submit at https://t.co/smvT6xhh06. Students are encouraged to sign up soon. Call my office with questions: 205.968.1290. https://t.co/stSYYu62Ha
Thank you @NTU for the honor of the Taxpayers' Friend Award!   https://t.co/kKmL7dGEXe

We must work for equality & justice while we also work to restore law & order again if we have any hope of change or any hope for people of all races to be able to respect & value one another so we can live together in unity & peace.
I mourn injustice with those wronged & this week that sadly includes both those grieved by the deaths of Floyd Taylor & Arbery and those who harmed amidst violent riots.
None of this should be tolerated & these actions do not serve a just cause. Justice cannot be served by inflicting more injustice & these dangerous riots have distracted from the original tragedy.

Unfortunately too many of these protests including those in my own state of AL haven’t stayed peaceful. Violence & anarchy have broken out. We‘ve seen businesses looted national monuments defamed law enforcement threatened & lives and livelihoods of innocents endangered.

This weekend we‘ve seen many peaceful protests over the unjustified killings of #GeorgeFloyd #BreonnaTaylor & #AhmaudArbery. I too am outraged over these deaths & pray justice will be swift with urgency to address underlying issues of distrust & suspicion that divide us.

I've joined the lawsuit against Pelosi and her fellow Democrats to challenge their rule change to allow proxy voting. It's simple: You cannot represent your constituents on the House floor when you’re not present to vote on their behalf. Full statement: https://t.co/YgAzDjegRJ

I'm honored that Citizens Against @GovWaste (CCAGW) named me a 2019 Taxpayer Hero for a financially responsible voting record. For 2019 135 House Members were given this honor. CCAGW leads the way in advocating for stopping fraud and waste in government. https://t.co/3tVI2NVGMX

I'm pleased President @realDonaldTrump has highlighted the importance of faith communities during this difficult time for our country. Check out these new interim guidelines from @CDCgov on how churches can safely hold services while we navigate #COVID19. https://t.co/25MfQ0ifaT
Today we honor and remember the courageous men and women who have fought and died to protect our freedom. #MemorialDay2020 https://t.co/LORN8FOPYx
